trans-unit.source: Represents a control that creates a pop-up window to display information about an element in the Ribbon.
trans-unit.target: 表示创建一个弹出窗口，以在功能区中显示有关元素的信息的控件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonToolTip"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonToolTip"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the descriptive text that is displayed for the control that is associated with this ToolTip.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置与此工具提示关联的控件显示的描述性文本。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: The descriptive text to display in the ToolTip.
trans-unit.target: 要在工具提示中显示的描述性文本。

trans-unit.source: The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 注册的默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关什么可以影响值的详细信息，请参阅[依赖项属性值优先级](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the descriptive text that is displayed in the ToolTip footer for the control that is associated with this ToolTip.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置与此工具提示关联的控件的工具提示页脚中显示的描述性文本。

trans-unit.source: The descriptive text to display in the footer of the ToolTip.
trans-unit.target: 要在工具提示的页脚中显示的描述性文本。

trans-unit.source: The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 注册的默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关什么可以影响值的详细信息，请参阅[依赖项属性值优先级](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the ToolTip has content in its footer.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示工具提示是否具有在其页脚中的内容。

trans-unit.source: This property returns `true` if any one of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonToolTip.FooterDescription%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonToolTip.FooterTitle%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonToolTip.FooterImageSource%2A> properties has content.
trans-unit.target: 此属性返回`true`如果的任一<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonToolTip.FooterDescription%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonToolTip.FooterTitle%2A>，或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonToolTip.FooterImageSource%2A>属性具有的内容。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonToolTip.FooterImageSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonToolTip.FooterTitle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonToolTip.FooterDescription%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the ToolTip has content in its footer; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果工具提示在其页脚; 中具有的内容否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 注册的默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关什么可以影响值的详细信息，请参阅[依赖项属性值优先级](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.target: 获取对<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"></xref>属于此控件。

trans-unit.source: This property is set on the parent <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon> control and is inherited by the child controls.
trans-unit.target: 在父类上设置此属性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>控制和由这些子控件继承。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>

trans-unit.source: It is used to access visual style brushes defined on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon> class.
